section.p: You dodge down a side tunnel, and mutter an enchantment intended to give you the appearance of a ratman. Your pursuers come bundling around a corner - one of them stops to shout at you, ‘Where’d the human go?’
Nonchalantly, you point down the tunnel, and the ratmen go haring off down it, whooping and yelling. You turn and walk the other way, a smile on your face. .
